# UICellAccessory.Placement.Position

**Type Alias**

The index position of the cell accessory in relation to the other accessories in the specified array.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Position = ([UICellAccessory]) -> Int
```

## Specifying position

- **position(after:)**: Provides a position after the accessory that matches the specified type, or at the end if there’s no matching type.
- **position(before:)**: Provides a position before the accessory that matches the specified type, or at the beginning if there’s no matching type.

items.description: Provides a position after the accessory that matches the specified type, or at the end if there’s no matching type.
items.name: position(after:)

items.description: Provides a position before the accessory that matches the specified type, or at the beginning if there’s no matching type.
items.name: position(before:)

title: UICellAccessory.Placement.Position
